script.name: Cmd.Anarkis.Pirate.Carrier.Hq.AI
script.description: Pirate Guild - Cmd : main AI module for the HQ M1 Carrier

line.comment: * This script is the main module to handle the HQ carrier
* The main PG carrier will roam across the universe attacking enemy assets
* and retreat to secure sectors when in danger. It will repair and get new
* - Weird ownership handling 'cause of stupid auto respawn of fighters...
* So, let's manually handle owned ships to prevent this shitty ship respawning !
* Check variables and self destroy if error
* Are we damaged, if yes we'll have to dock and repair at a neutral SY
* Let's relax for a while if we are in a secure sector
* Attack if ready to do so (full dock)
* We should be good to go now, let's find a sector to annoy
* Clear battle variable, dock everyone, wait for ships to dock at carrier
* And reduce the kill count of the targeted race
* Find a Pirate Base with some ships to give
* No PB in pirate sector ? Let's try somewhere else
* No One PB ?! damn too bad, resume.

line.text: '%s resupplies with ships and energy cells at %s'

line.comment: * PB has been destroyed, try again now
* While we are here, lets get e.cells (need works)
* No SY ?! damn too bad, resume.
* SY full or has been destroyed

sval.val: Pirate Guild - Cmd : main AI module for the HQ M1 Carrier
%s resupplies with ships and energy cells at %s
This script is the main module to handle the HQ carrier
The main PG carrier will roam across the universe attacking enemy assets
and retreat to secure sectors when in danger. It will repair and get new
- Weird ownership handling 'cause of stupid auto respawn of fighters...
So, let's manually handle owned ships to prevent this shitty ship respawning !
Check variables and self destroy if error
Are we damaged, if yes we'll have to dock and repair at a neutral SY
Let's relax for a while if we are in a secure sector
Attack if ready to do so (full dock)
We should be good to go now, let's find a sector to annoy
Clear battle variable, dock everyone, wait for ships to dock at carrier
And reduce the kill count of the targeted race
Find a Pirate Base with some ships to give
No PB in pirate sector ? Let's try somewhere else
No One PB ?! damn too bad, resume.
PB has been destroyed, try again now
While we are here, lets get e.cells (need works)
No SY ?! damn too bad, resume.
SY full or has been destroyed
